divs: Sighting DetailsOn back porch talking with wife when i noticed these hovering pulsating lights didn't move for couple hours then slowly rose out of sight, had no tripod or sufficient way to stabilize camera, then all the sudden after a few pics battery's suddenly died Nikon Coolpix L820
Summary: unknown object hovered for hours with slow gentle rise
